channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-5414] The result of show grant is not visible via JDBC
item.description: Currently, show grant / show role grant does not make fetch task, which provides the result schema for jdbc clients.
item.summary: The result of show grant is not visible via JDBC

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

thejas has commented on the revision "HIVE-5414 [jira] The result of show grant is not visible via JDBC".

The patch does not apply on trunk anymore. Can you also please rebase ?
Sorry about the delay in reviewing this patch.

INLINE COMMENTS
ql/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/ql/plan/ShowGrantDesc.java:36 I think "property" would be a better name for column, than "key".
itests/hive-unit/src/test/java/org/apache/hive/jdbc/TestJdbcDriver2.java:1816 can you also add test for column name and column type of result ?
itests/hive-unit/src/test/java/org/apache/hive/jdbc/TestJdbcDriver2.java:1814 can you also add a test for 'show roles' ?
